abstract: A guest appearance from Britney Spears helped CBS’s “How I Met Your Mother” attract its largest audience of the season on Monday as 10.6 million viewers tuned in to the 8:30 p.m. sitcom, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: A guest appearance from Britney Spears helped CBS’s “How I Met Your Mother” attract its largest audience of the season on Monday as 10.6 million viewers tuned in to the 8:30 p.m. sitcom, according to Nielsen’s estimates.

headline.main: ABC and CBS Top Monday Night’s Ratings
